# updateWindowsItem(_:)

**Instance Method**

Updates the Window menu item for a given window to reflect the edited status of that window.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func updateWindowsItem(_ win: NSWindow)
```

## Parameters

- **win**: The window whose menu item is to be updated.

## Discussion

You rarely need to invoke this method because it is invoked automatically when the edit status of an [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWindow] object is set.

## Related Documentation

- **isDocumentEdited**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the window’s document has been edited.

## Managing the Window Menu

- **windowsMenu**: The Window menu of the app.
- **addWindowsItem(_:title:filename:)**: Adds an item to the Window menu for a given window.
- **changeWindowsItem(_:title:filename:)**: Changes the item for a given window in the Window menu to a given string.
- **removeWindowsItem(_:)**: Removes the Window menu item for a given window.
